mapper.sql: id, type, name, url, remark, delete_flag, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.type, a.name, a.url, a.remark, a.delete_flag, a.create_user, a.create_time, a.update_user, a.update_time,b.name AS typeName from image a LEFT JOIN type b ON a.type = b.id WHERE 1=1
AND a.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND b.name = #{typeName}
ORDER BY a.id DESC
mapper.insert: insert into image (id, type, name, url, remark, delete_flag, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,

mapper.update:
update image
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update image set type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
